headline: What United Rentals (URI)'s Alfasi Deal and Debt Raise Mean for Its Specialty Growth Story
summary: In recent days, United Rentals reported a high GF Score of 95 out of 100, completed a US$1.50 billion senior notes offering, and expanded its footprint by acquiring Australian rental firm Alfasi Hire. Together with analysts reaffirming positive views on the business, these moves underline management’s emphasis on specialty rental growth and reinforcing its one‑stop‑shop positioning. Next, we’ll explore how the Alfasi Hire acquisition could influence United Rentals’ existing investment...
